Strops:ArcaneTalents.NAME: Gift of Arcane
Strops:ArcaneTalents.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL strops:Turnthirst ( !M! ):The damage is increased by !Strops:KN1! . NL Exhaust. NL Add a *Gift *of *Frost on top of your draw pile.
Strops:ArcaneTalents.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL strops:Turnthirst ( !M! ):The damage is increased by !Strops:KN1! . NL Exhaust. NL Add a *Gift *of *Frost+ on top of your draw pile.

Strops:FrostTalents.NAME: Gift of Frost
Strops:FrostTalents.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL strops:Turnthirst ( !M! ):The Block is increased by !Strops:KN1! . NL Exhaust. NL Add a *Gift *of *Fire on top of your draw pile.
Strops:FrostTalents.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL strops:Turnthirst ( !M! ):The Block is increased by !Strops:KN1! . NL Exhaust. NL Add a *Gift *of *Fire+ on top of your draw pile.

Strops:FireTalents.NAME: Gift of Fire
Strops:FireTalents.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deal !M! damage, randomly split among all enemies. NL strops:Turnthirst ( !Strops:KN1! ):The value is increased by !Strops:KN2! .

Strops:LightningStorm.NAME: Lightning Storm
Strops:LightningStorm.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Lightning for each Lightning Channeled last turn.
Strops:LightningStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Lightning for each Lightning Channeled last turn. NL Channel !Strops:KN1! more Lightning.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ( !Strops:KN2! Lightning to Channel in total.)

Strops:ChooseAttemptedVersion.NAME: Dress Yourself
Strops:ChooseAttemptedVersion.DESCRIPTION: The Merchant will have all its relics slightly discounted.

Strops:ChooseAchievedVersion.NAME: Dress the Merchant
Strops:ChooseAchievedVersion.DESCRIPTION: The Merchant will only sell *Rare relics, but they're super cheaper!

Strops:HealToFull.NAME: The Morning Glow
Strops:HealToFull.DESCRIPTION: Heal all of your HP at the start of each Act as well as immediately.

Strops:GetBlizzard.NAME: The Long Night
Strops:GetBlizzard.DESCRIPTION: lose !M! Max HP and !Strops:KN1! HP successively, and obtain a *Blizzard potion.

Strops:EatSuperMango.NAME: Super Mango
Strops:EatSuperMango.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Max HP, but lose !Strops:KN2! Strength at the start of the next !Strops:KN1! combats.

Strops:ToEscape.NAME: Far Away
Strops:ToEscape.DESCRIPTION: Change all the *? rooms in the second Act into *Campfire ones.

Strops:ToGetHer.NAME: The End of The World
Strops:ToGetHer.DESCRIPTION: Change all the *? rooms in the second Act into *Campfire ones, and all the *Normal *Enemy rooms into *Elite ones.

Strops:BodySlamPlusPlus.NAME: Body Slam++
Strops:BodySlamPlusPlus.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage double as much as your Block.

Strops:SoulCraftedCard.NAME: Soul Craft:
Strops:SoulCraftedCard.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Draw a card when this is drawn. NL !M! play left before getting removed from your deck. NL Trigger *%s.
